attributes.action: Dentists to be through the NHS and not private
attributes.additional_details: More and more people are suffering with bad mouth hygiene tooth loss has great mental health effects but dentists are so expensive it is unmanageable and cosmetic repairs replacements are unreachable to the normal working class people
attributes.background: To bring the dentists back to the nhs

rejection.details:
Dentistry services are already available through the NHS. We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding to ensure all adults in England have access to an NHS dentist: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576982
